00001 #include "dsCMatrix.h"
00002 
00003 static int chk_nm(const char *nm, int perm, int LDL, int super)
00004 {
00005     if (strlen(nm) != 11) return 0;
00006     if (strcmp(nm + 3, "Cholesky")) return 0;
00007     if (super > 0 && nm[0] != 'S') return 0;
00008     if (super == 0 && nm[0] != 's') return 0;
00009     if (perm > 0 && nm[1] != 'P') return 0;
00010     if (perm == 0 && nm[1] != 'p') return 0;
00011     if (LDL > 0 && nm[2] != 'D') return 0;
00012     if (LDL == 0 && nm[2] != 'd') return 0;
00013     return 1;
00014 }
00015 
00033 /* FIXME:    LDL < 0 is still equivalent to LDL > 0 ! */
00034 static CHM_FR
00035 internal_chm_factor(SEXP Ap, int perm, int LDL, int super, double Imult)
00036 {
00037     SEXP facs = GET_SLOT(Ap, Matrix_factorSym);
00038     SEXP nms = getAttrib(facs, R_NamesSymbol);
00039     CHM_FR L;
00040     CHM_SP A = AS_CHM_SP__(Ap);
00041     R_CheckStack();
00042 
00043     CHM_store_common();         /* save settings from c */
00044     if (LENGTH(facs)) {
00045         for (int i = 0; i < LENGTH(nms); i++) { /* look for a match in cache */
00046             if (chk_nm(CHAR(STRING_ELT(nms, i)), perm, LDL, super)) {
00047                 L = AS_CHM_FR(VECTOR_ELT(facs, i));
00048                 R_CheckStack();
00049                 /* copy the factor so later it can safely be cholmod_l_free'd */
00050                 L = cholmod_l_copy_factor(L, &c);
00051                 if (Imult) cholmod_l_factorize_p(A, &Imult, (int*)NULL, 0, L, &c);
00052                 return L;
00053             }
00054         }
00055     }
00056     /* Else:  No cached factor - create one */
00057 
00058     /* sup = c.supernodal;              /\* save current settings *\/ */
00059     /* ll = c.final_ll; */
00060 
00061     c.final_ll = (LDL == 0) ? 1 : 0;
00062     c.supernodal = (super > 0) ? CHOLMOD_SUPERNODAL :
00063         ((super < 0) ? CHOLMOD_AUTO :
00064          /* super == 0 */ CHOLMOD_SIMPLICIAL);
00065 
00066     if (perm) {                 /* obtain fill-reducing permutation */
00067         L = cholmod_l_analyze(A, &c);
00068     } else {                    /* require identity permutation */
00069         /* save current settings */
00070         /* int nmethods = c.nmethods, ord0 = c.method[0].ordering, */
00071         /*     postorder = c.postorder; */
00072         c.nmethods = 1; c.method[0].ordering = CHOLMOD_NATURAL; c.postorder = FALSE;
00073         L = cholmod_l_analyze(A, &c);
00074         /* and now restore */
00075         /* c.nmethods = nmethods; c.method[0].ordering = ord0; c.postorder = postorder; */
00076     }
00077     /* Note that the "restore" (above and below) now only "works",
00078      * because our error handler call cholmod_l_defaults() ! */
00079 
00080     if (!cholmod_l_factorize_p(A, &Imult, (int*)NULL, 0 /*fsize*/, L, &c))
00081         error(_("Cholesky factorization failed"));
00082     /* c.supernodal = sup;              /\* restore previous settings *\/ */
00083     /* c.final_ll = ll; */
00084 
00085     if (!Imult) {               /* cache the factor */
00086         char fnm[12] = "sPDCholesky";
00087 
00088         /* now that we allow (super, LDL) to be "< 0", be careful :*/
00089         if(super < 0) super = L->is_super ? 1 : 0;
00090         if(LDL < 0)   LDL   = L->is_ll    ? 0 : 1;
00091 
00092         if (super > 0) fnm[0] = 'S';
00093         if (perm == 0) fnm[1] = 'p';
00094         if (LDL  == 0) fnm[2] = 'd';
00095         set_factors(Ap, chm_factor_to_SEXP(L, 0), fnm);
00096     }
00097     CHM_restore_common();
00098     return L;
00099 }
00100 
00101 SEXP dsCMatrix_chol(SEXP x, SEXP pivot)
00102 {
00103     int pivP = asLogical(pivot);
00104     CHM_FR L = internal_chm_factor(x, pivP, /*LDL = */ 0, /* super = */ 0,
00105                                    /* Imult = */ 0.);
00106     CHM_SP R, Rt;
00107     SEXP ans;
00108 
00109     Rt = cholmod_l_factor_to_sparse(L, &c);
00110     R = cholmod_l_transpose(Rt, /*values*/ 1, &c);
00111     cholmod_l_free_sparse(&Rt, &c);
00112     ans = PROTECT(chm_sparse_to_SEXP(R, 1/*do_free*/, 1/*uploT*/, 0/*Rkind*/,
00113                                      "N"/*diag*/, GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_DimNamesSym)));
00114 
00115     if (pivP) {
00116         SEXP piv = PROTECT(allocVector(INTSXP, L->n));
00117         int *dest = INTEGER(piv), *src = (int*)L->Perm;
00118 
00119         for (int i = 0; i < L->n; i++) dest[i] = src[i] + 1;
00120         setAttrib(ans, install("pivot"), piv);
00121         setAttrib(ans, install("rank"), ScalarInteger((size_t) L->minor));
00122         UNPROTECT(1);
00123     }
00124     cholmod_l_free_factor(&L, &c);
00125     UNPROTECT(1);
00126     return ans;
00127 }
00128 
00129 SEXP dsCMatrix_Cholesky(SEXP Ap, SEXP perm, SEXP LDL, SEXP super, SEXP Imult)
00130 {
00131     int iSuper = asLogical(super),
00132         iPerm  = asLogical(perm),
00133         iLDL   = asLogical(LDL);
00134     int c_pr = c.print;
00135     c.print = 0;/* stop CHOLMOD printing; we cannot suppress it (in R), and
00136                    have error handler already */
00137 
00138     /* When parameter is set to  NA  in R, let CHOLMOD choose */
00139     if(iSuper == NA_LOGICAL)    iSuper = -1;
00140     /* if(iPerm  == NA_LOGICAL) iPerm  = -1; */
00141     if(iLDL   == NA_LOGICAL)    iLDL   = -1;
00142     SEXP r = chm_factor_to_SEXP(internal_chm_factor(Ap, iPerm, iLDL, iSuper,
00143                                                     asReal(Imult)),
00144                                 1 /* dofree */);
00145     c.print = c_pr;
00146     return r;
00147 }
00148 
00162 SEXP dsCMatrix_LDL_D(SEXP Ap, SEXP permP, SEXP resultKind)
00163 {
00164     CHM_FR L;
00165     SEXP ans;
00166     int c_pr = c.print;
00167     c.print = 0;/* stop CHOLMOD printing; we cannot suppress it (in R), and
00168                    have error handler already */
00169     L = internal_chm_factor(Ap, asLogical(permP),
00170                             /*LDL*/ 1, /*super*/0, /*Imult*/0.);
00171     c.print = c_pr;
00172     ans = PROTECT(diag_tC_ptr(L->n,
00173                               L->p,
00174                               L->x,
00175                               L->Perm,
00176                               resultKind));
00177     cholmod_l_free_factor(&L, &c);
00178     UNPROTECT(1);
00179     return(ans);
00180 }

00182 SEXP dsCMatrix_Csparse_solve(SEXP a, SEXP b)
00183 {
00184     CHM_FR L = internal_chm_factor(a, -1, -1, -1, 0.);
00185     CHM_SP cx, cb = AS_CHM_SP(b);
00186     R_CheckStack();
00187 
00188     cx = cholmod_l_spsolve(CHOLMOD_A, L, cb, &c);
00189     cholmod_l_free_factor(&L, &c);
00190     return chm_sparse_to_SEXP(cx, /*do_free*/ 1, /*uploT*/ 0,
00191                               /*Rkind*/ 0, /*diag*/ "N",
00192                               /*dimnames = */ R_NilValue);
00193 }
00194 
00195 SEXP dsCMatrix_matrix_solve(SEXP a, SEXP b)
00196 {
00197     CHM_FR L = internal_chm_factor(a, -1, -1, -1, 0.);
00198     CHM_DN cx, cb = AS_CHM_DN(PROTECT(mMatrix_as_dgeMatrix(b)));
00199     R_CheckStack();
00200 
00201     cx = cholmod_l_solve(CHOLMOD_A, L, cb, &c);
00202     cholmod_l_free_factor(&L, &c);
00203     UNPROTECT(1);
00204     return chm_dense_to_SEXP(cx, 1, 0, /*dimnames = */ R_NilValue);
00205 }
00206 
00207 /* Needed for printing dsCMatrix objects */
00208 /* FIXME: Create a more general version of this operation: also for lsC, (dsR?),..
00209 *         e.g. make  compressed_to_dgTMatrix() in ./dgCMatrix.c work for dsC */
00210 SEXP dsCMatrix_to_dgTMatrix(SEXP x)
00211 {
00212     CHM_SP A = AS_CHM_SP__(x);
00213     CHM_SP Afull = cholmod_l_copy(A, /*stype*/ 0, /*mode*/ CHOLMOD_REAL, &c);
00214     CHM_TR At = cholmod_l_sparse_to_triplet(Afull, &c);
00215     R_CheckStack();
00216 
00217     if (!A->stype)
00218         error(_("Non-symmetric matrix passed to dsCMatrix_to_dgTMatrix"));
00219     cholmod_l_free_sparse(&Afull, &c);
00220     return chm_triplet_to_SEXP(At, 1, /*uploT*/ 0, /*Rkind*/ 0, "",
00221                                GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_DimNamesSym));
00222 }
